squidpony.squidmath

Class UnifiedNoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidmath.UnifiedNoise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D

    public class UnifiedNoise
extends java.lang.Object
implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D
    Simplex noise functions, in 2D, 3D, 4D, 5D, and 6D, based on SeededNoise but implemented more similarly internally for 4D, 5D, and 6D noise. This has different output from SeededNoise because it uses the newer, faster HappyPointHash instead of HastyPointHash.

        protected static double gradCoord3D(long seed,
                                    int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int z,
                                    double xd,
                                    double yd,
                                    double zd)
        Computes the hash for a 3D int point and its dot product with a 3D double point as one step.
        Returns:
        a double between -1.2571 and 1.2571, exclusive

      • noise

        public static double noise(double x,
                           double y,
                           double z,
                           double w,
                           double u,
                           long seed)
        Thanks to Mark A. Ropper for this implementation.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
        w - w coordinate (4th dimension)
        u - u coordinate (5th dimension)
        seed - long value that should completely change the noise if it changes even slightly
        Returns:
        a continuous noise value between -1.0 and 1.0, both inclusive
